description: Retrieves the specified registration type field definitions. You can use DescribeRegistrationFieldDefinitions to view the requirements for creating, filling out, and submitting each registration type.

parameters.name: RegistrationType
parameters.description: The type of registration form. The list of RegistrationTypes can be found using the  DescribeRegistrationTypeDefinitions action.

parameters.name: FieldPaths
parameters.description: An array of paths to the registration form field. (string) ---

nested_items.name: RegistrationType
nested_items.description: The type of registration form. The list of RegistrationTypes can be found using the  DescribeRegistrationTypeDefinitions action.

nested_items.name: RegistrationFieldDefinitions
nested_items.description: An array of RegistrationFieldDefinitions objects that contain the details for the requested fields.

nested_items.name: SectionPath
nested_items.description: The section path of the field.

nested_items.name: FieldPath
nested_items.description: The path to the registration form field. You can use  DescribeRegistrationFieldDefinitions for a list of FieldPaths.

nested_items.name: FieldType
nested_items.description: The type of field.

nested_items.name: FieldRequirement
nested_items.description: Specifies if the field for the registration form is required, conditional or optional.

nested_items.name: SelectValidation
nested_items.description: The validation rules for a select field.

nested_items.name: MinChoices
nested_items.description: The minimum number of choices for the select.

nested_items.name: MaxChoices
nested_items.description: The maximum number of choices for the select.

nested_items.name: Options
nested_items.description: An array of strings for the possible selection options.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TextValidation
nested_items.description: The validation rules for a text field.

nested_items.name: MinLength
nested_items.description: The minimum number of characters for the text field.

nested_items.name: MaxLength
nested_items.description: The maximum number of characters for the text field.

nested_items.name: Pattern
nested_items.description: The regular expression used to validate the text field.

nested_items.name: DisplayHints
nested_items.description: An array of RegistrationFieldDisplayHints objects for the field.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of the display hint.

nested_items.name: ShortDescription
nested_items.description: A short description of the display hint.

nested_items.name: LongDescription
nested_items.description: A full description of the display hint.

nested_items.name: DocumentationTitle
nested_items.description: The title of the document the display hint is associated with.

nested_items.name: DocumentationLink
nested_items.description: The link to the document the display hint is associated with.

nested_items.name: SelectOptionDescriptions
nested_items.description: An array of SelectOptionDescription objects.

nested_items.name: Option
nested_items.description: The value of the option.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of the select option.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the option meaning.

nested_items.name: TextValidationDescription
nested_items.description: The validation rules for the text field.

nested_items.name: ExampleTextValue
nested_items.description: Example text of what the value of a field should contain.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to be used for the next set of paginated results. You don't need to supply a value for this field in the initial request.
